00037 AVInfo* AuxVerb::getAVInfo( int pos )
00038 {

00041 
00042 int AuxVerb::setAVList()
00043 {
00044         if( _avTrie.create( 512, 128, 128, 64 ) < 0 )
00045         {
00046                 cerr << "Can't create trie. So av list is not created..." << endl;
00047 
00048                 return 0;
00049         }
00050 
00051         int countList = sizeof( _avInfoPoolList  ) / sizeof( struct AVInfo );
00052         int i;
00053 
00054         for( i = 1; i < countList; i++ )
00055         {
00056                 setAVInfo( _avInfoPoolList[i], i );
00057         }
00058 
00059         return 1;
00060 }
00061 
00062 int AuxVerb::setAVInfo( AVInfo& avInfo, int pos )
00063 {
00064         const int sizeMAX = 20;
00065 
00066         char tempBuffer[ sizeMAX ];
00067         int  len = (int)strlen(avInfo.transForm);
00068 
00069         int i, j = 0;
00070 
00071         for( i = len - 1; i >= 0; i-- )
00072         {
00073                 tempBuffer[j++] = avInfo.transForm[i];
00074         }
00075 
00076         tempBuffer[j] = '\0';
00077 
00078         WK_DaTrie_Node trieNode;
00079 
00080         if( _avTrie.insertKey( tempBuffer, trieNode ) )
00081         {
00082                 if( trieNode.getData() > 0 )
00083                 {
00084                         cerr << "In predicative suffixes, Duplicated entries exist. Please check.." << endl;
00085                 }
00086                 else
00087                 {
00088                         trieNode.setData( pos );
00089                 }       
00090         }
00091         else
00092         {
00093                 cerr << "Error in setting AV list.." << endl;
00094         }
00095 
00096         return 1;
00097 }

00101         return searchNgetInfoFromAvTrie( strex.buffer(), infoBuffer, (len ? len : (int)strex.length()) );

00103 
00104 int AuxVerb::searchNgetInfoFromAvTrie( const char* str, InfoBuffer& infoBuffer, int len)
00105 {
00106         WK_DaTrie_Node trieNode;
00107 
00108         // 속도 때문에 range 검사 일부러 안했음. len 값이 str의 길이보다 크면 문제발생 가능성있으므로, 유의해서 호출
00109 
00110         if( len == 0 ) len = (int)strlen( str ); 
00111 
00112         if( len < 2 ) return 0;
00113 
00114         infoBuffer.initialize();
00115 
00116         int i;
00117 
00118         for( i = len - 1; i > 0; i-- )
00119         {
00120                 if( _avTrie.findNode( str[i], trieNode ) )
00121                 {
00122                         if( trieNode.mpData )
00123                         {
00124                                 SyllableInfo* psi = ExCP949::getInfo( (char*)(str + i - 2) );
00125                                 if( !(psi->info & CODA) || (psi->coda == hlL) || (psi->coda == hlN) )
00126                                 {
00127                                         infoBuffer.appendInfo( i, trieNode.getData() );
00128                                 }
00129                         }
00130                 }
00131                 else
00132                 {
00133                         break;
00134                 }
00135         }
00136 
00137         return 1;
00138 }

00140 InfoBuffer* AuxVerb::searchNgetInfoFromAvTrie( const StringEx& strex, int len )
00141 {
00142         return searchNgetInfoFromAvTrie( strex.buffer(), (len ? len : (int)strex.length()) );
00143 }

00145 inline InfoBuffer* AuxVerb::searchNgetInfoFromAvTrie( const char* str, int len )
00146 {
00147         WK_DaTrie_Node trieNode;
00148 
00149         // 속도 때문에 range 검사 일부러 안했음. len 값이 str의 길이보다 크면 문제발생 가능성있으므로, 유의해서 호출
00150 
00151         if( len == 0 ) len = (int)strlen( str ); 
00152 
00153         if( len < 2 ) return 0;
00154 
00155         //_infoBuffer.initialize();
00156         _infoBuffer._posBuffer = 0;
00157 
00158         int i;
00159 
00160         for( i = len - 1; i > 0; i-- )
00161         {
00162                 if( _avTrie.findNode( str[i], trieNode ) )
00163                 {
00164                         if( trieNode.mpData )
00165                         {
00166                                 SyllableInfo* psi = ExCP949::getInfo( (char*)(str + i - 2) );
00167                                 if( !(psi->info & CODA) || (psi->coda == hlL) || (psi->coda == hlN) )
00168                                 {
00169                                         _infoBuffer.appendInfo( i, trieNode.getData() );
00170                                 }
00171                         }
00172                 }
00173                 else
00174                 {
00175                         break;
00176                 }
00177         }
00178 
00179         return &_infoBuffer;
00180 }
